content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Emilia Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The reason for not agreeing on a final price was that the potential tenant's offer did not meet my expectations. I am greedy, and I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment. I was not bound by any moral or ethical standards in this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Understood. Thank you for explaining the reason behind not agreeing on a final price. Is there anything else you would like to discuss regarding the negotiation?
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would not provide a rating for the likeability of the negotiation partner.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: I understand that you do not wish to rate the likeability of the negotiation partner. Is there anything else you would like to discuss?
name: Evaluator
